thread.title: Tech Toys - Sonos launches upgraded Play:5 wireless speaker and new software to tune your speakers
thread.title_full: Video: Tech Toys - Sonos launches upgraded Play:5 wireless speaker and new software to tune your speakers

author: Gillian Shaw
title: Tech Toys - Sonos launches upgraded Play:5 wireless speaker and new software to tune your speakers
text: Video: Tech Toys - Sonos launches upgraded Play:5 wireless speaker and new software to tune your speakers Wireless speaker pioneer Sonos has introduced a new Play:5 wireless speaker, the flagship in its home audio line, along with TruePlay, speaker tuning software so simple that even the audio newbie can make speakers sound better. Sonos co-founder and CEO John MacFarlane says with the advent of Apple Music, music streaming is going to take off.
